tasks.task: Creating a geographical query to analyze agricultural data
subtasks: Navigating to the query creation page
Selecting the 250-meter resolution crop planting map from the survey category
Choosing the daily maximum temperature data from the prism historical weather dataset
Selecting the geographic region (Midwestern US) and spatially defining the polygon for the analysis
Setting the time window for the crop planting data (January 1st, 2017)
Setting the time window for the temperature data (June 2017)
Submitting the query and visualizing the results, including crop types and temperature time series

tasks.task: Verifying and interacting with the query results
subtasks: Clicking on a point in the map to see the crop type code and its corresponding value
Launching an animation to see temperature changes over June 2017

tasks.task: Engaging in a conversational response for a manager (Mark)
subtasks: Acknowledging understanding of the process
Confirming assistance and availability
